Welcome to **PREACT-digital**!

As part of the PREACT research group, we collect high-resolution digital phenotypes in patients undergoing cognitive behavioral therapy for internalizing disorders. In line with open-science principles, this site documents our study procedures, data structures, and preprocessing pipelines.

::: {.callout-tip appearance="simple"}
**Study protocol:** <https://doi.org/10.1101/2025.03.14.25323957>
:::

### What you’ll find here
- Study procedures and timelines  
- Data structure (IDs, tables, joins, time zones)  
- Preprocessing decisions and QA notes
